Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the formicidae venom precursor-01 superfamily.
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.30658410] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC Negative);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC<50μM);Fungi:Saccharomyces cerevisiae (MIC Negative)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.30658410] 6.9% hemolysis at 10μM and 94.8% at 50 μM against rat blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented

Literature.Title: Mass Spectrometry Analysis and Biological Characterization of the Predatory Ant Odontomachus monticola Venom and Venom Sac Components
Literature.Reference: Toxins (Basel). 2019 Jan; 11(1) 50. Published online 2019 Jan 17. doi 10.3390/toxins11010050
Literature.Author: Naoki Tani, Kohei Kazuma, Yukio Ohtsuka, Yasushi Shigeri, Keiichi Masuko, Katsuhiro Konno, Hidetoshi Inagaki
